TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class SqlTransaction : System.Data.Common.DbTransaction, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlTransaction extends System.Data.Common.DbTransaction implements class System.Data.IDbTransaction, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SqlTransaction Inherits DbTransaction Implements IDisposable
public ref class SqlTransaction sealed : System::Data::Common::DbTransaction, IDisposable
type SqlTransaction = class inherit DbTransaction interface IDbTransaction interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示要在 SQL Server 資料庫中進行的 Transact-SQL 交易。

span.span: Represents a Transact-SQL transaction to be made in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式建立藉由呼叫物件上物件。The application creates a object by calling on the object. 執行交易 （例如，認可或中止交易），相關聯的所有後續作業物件。All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction), are performed on the object. > [!NOTE] > `Try`/`Catch` 認可或回復時，應該一律使用例外狀況處理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when committing or rolling back a . 兩者並產生如果連線已終止，或如果交易已經復原回伺服器上。Both and generate an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[外顯交易](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms175127\(SQL.105\).aspx)並[撰寫有效率的異動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms187484\(SQL.105\).aspx)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Explicit Transactions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms175127\(SQL.105\).aspx) and [Coding Efficient Transactions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms187484\(SQL.105\).aspx). ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 交易已回復任何錯誤時，或如果它已處置而不需要先認可。The transaction is rolled back on any error, or if it is disposed without first being committed. `Try`/`Catch` 錯誤處理用來處理任何錯誤，當您嘗試認可或回復交易時。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法相當於 TRANSACT-SQL COMMIT TRANSACTION 陳述式。The method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL COMMIT TRANSACTION statement. 您無法回復交易之後已經過認可，因為所有修改已都成為資料庫永久的一部分。You cannot roll back a transaction once it has been committed, because all modifications have become a permanent part of the database. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [COMMIT TRANSACTION & Amp;#40;transact-SQL) ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/commit-transaction-transact-sql)。For more information, see [COMMIT TRANSACTION (Transact-SQL) ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/commit-transaction-transact-sql). > [!NOTE] > `Try`/`Catch` 認可或回復時，應該一律使用例外狀況處理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when committing or rolling back a . 兩者`Commit`並會產生如果連線已終止，或如果交易已經復原回伺服器上。Both `Commit` and generates an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 交易回復任何錯誤。The transaction is rolled back on any error. `Try`/`Catch` 錯誤處理用來處理任何錯誤，當您嘗試認可或回復交易時。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 嘗試認可交易時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Connection As SqlConnection
public: property System::Data::SqlClient::SqlConnection ^ Connection { System::Data::SqlClient::SqlConnection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與交易相關聯的 物件或 (如果交易不再有效)。

span.span: Gets the object associated with the transaction, or if the transaction is no longer valid.

value.span: 與交易相關聯的 物件。

span.span: The object associated with the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一應用程式可能有多個資料庫連線，每個都有零個或多個交易。A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions. 此屬性可讓您判斷所建立的特定交易相關聯的連接物件。This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by .

protected: virtual property System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ DbConnection { System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ get(); };

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsolationLevel As IsolationLevel
public: virtual property System::Data::IsolationLevel IsolationLevel { System::Data::IsolationLevel get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支援平行交易。Parallel transactions are not supported. 因此，適用於整個交易。Therefore, the applies to the whole transaction. 如需有關 SQL Server 隔離層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 交易隔離等級](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels)。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see [Transaction Isolation Levels](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels).

span.span: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback() cil managed

span.span: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法相當於 TRANSACT-SQL 的 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 陳述式。The method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ROLLBACK TRANSACTION & Amp;#40;transact-SQL) ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/rollback-transaction-transact-sql)。For more information, see [ROLLBACK TRANSACTION (Transact-SQL) ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/rollback-transaction-transact-sql). 可以只會回復交易從暫止狀態 (之後之前已呼叫稱為)。The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after has been called, but before is called). 交易會回復萬一它之前已處置`Commit`或`Rollback`呼叫。The transaction is rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called. > [!NOTE] > `Try`/`Catch` 回復交易時，應該一律使用例外狀況處理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when rolling back a transaction. A`Rollback`會產生如果連線已終止，或如果交易已經復原回伺服器上。A `Rollback` generates an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 交易回復任何錯誤。The transaction is rolled back on any error. `Try`/`Catch` 錯誤處理用來處理任何錯誤，當您嘗試認可或回復交易時。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rollback(string transactionName) cil managed

param.name: transactionName
param.span: 要復原的交易名稱，或要復原的儲存點。

span.span: The name of the transaction to roll back, or the savepoint to which to roll back.

summary.span: 從暫止狀態中復原交易，並指定交易和儲存點名稱。

span.span: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state, and specifies the transaction or savepoint name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法相當於 TRANSACT-SQL 的 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 陳述式。The method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). 可以只會回復交易從暫止狀態 (之後之前已呼叫稱為)。The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after has been called, but before is called). 如果它已處置之前，會回復交易`Commit`或`Rollback`呼叫。The transaction is rolled back if it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called. > [!NOTE] > `Try`/`Catch` 回復交易時，應該一律使用例外狀況處理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when rolling back a transaction. A`Rollback`會產生如果連線已終止，或如果交易已經復原回伺服器上。A `Rollback` generates an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 交易回復任何錯誤。The transaction is rolled back on any error. `Try`/`Catch` 錯誤處理用來處理任何錯誤，當您嘗試認可或回復交易時。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 沒有指定任何交易名稱。

span.span: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(string savePointName) cil managed

summary.span: 建立交易中的儲存點 (可用來復原部分的交易)，以及指定儲存點名稱。

span.span: Creates a savepoint in the transaction that can be used to roll back a part of the transaction, and specifies the savepoint name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法相當於 TRANSACT-SQL SAVE TRANSACTION 陳述式。 method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL SAVE TRANSACTION statement. 使用中的值`savePoint`參數可以是相同的值中使用`transactionName`參數的某些實作方法。The value used in the `savePoint` parameter can be the same value used in the `transactionName` parameter of some implementations of the method. 儲存點提供了回復部份交易的機制。Savepoints offer a mechanism to roll back parts of transactions. 您建立儲存點，使用方法，並稍後再呼叫回復到儲存點，而非回復到交易的開始方法。You create a savepoint using the method, and then later call the method to roll back to the savepoint instead of rolling back to the start of the transaction.

exception.span: 嘗試認可交易時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
